  • OS: Windows XP SP3, Windows Vista, Windows 7, Windows 8
  • Processor: Dual Core CPU 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated graphics card with 512MB memory. Can be played on integrated HD 3000 graphics (and better) with lowest quality. Can be played in windowed mode.

  • Additional Notes: Stable internet connection to the game servers required. 1280х720 minimum supported resolution.

  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
  • Additional Notes: Stable internet connection to the game servers required
